message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I understand your offer of $90, but I'm not quite ready to meet you halfway just yet. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $95. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $92?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $94. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still need to make a bit more of a dent. Would you be willing to go down to $92?
